Advanced Subjects Test, university entrance exam that assesses candidates’ higher level knowledge of specific subjects and their readiness to study in their selected academic discipline (Tw)/abbr. to 指考[Zhi3 kao3]
pinyin: Da4 xue2 Ru4 xue2 Zhi3 ding4 Ke1 mu4 Kao3 shi4
containing_words.word: 大學入學指定科目考試

sentences.english: When you share a page, you can designate users as viewers or editors.
sentences.chinese: 在共享頁面時，您可以將用戶指定爲查看者或編輯者。

sentences.english: Thee fopen function opens a specified file.
sentences.chinese: fopen函數打開一個指定的文件。

sentences.english: Available in selected TV programs in TVB Jade Channel.
sentences.chinese: 於指定的無線電視翡翠臺節目提供。

sentences.english: Consider that each resource pool has its own set of registered image templates.
sentences.chinese: 要考慮給每一個資源池指定自己的註冊圖像模板集。

sentences.english: The lawyer has been appointed to mediate between the employers and the union leaders.
sentences.chinese: 這位律師被指定在僱主和工會領導人之間進行調解。

sentences.english: Replaces the item at the specified index with a new object.
sentences.chinese: 使用指定項替換指定索引處的項。

sentences.english: Replaces the item at the specified index with a new object.
sentences.chinese: 使用指定項替換指定索引處的項。

sentences.english: Specify a constraining rule on the text in an element with mixed content.
sentences.chinese: 在具有混合內容的元素的文本中指定一個約束規則。

sentences.english: Specify download quota for automatic retrievals.
sentences.chinese: 指定下載配額爲自動檢索。

sentences.english: You can specify which non-key columns to include in the index and use the arrows again to specify the order.
sentences.chinese: 可以指定索引中包含哪些非鍵列並用箭頭指定次序。

sentences.english: You can specify which non-key columns to include in the index and use the arrows again to specify the order.
sentences.chinese: 可以指定索引中包含哪些非鍵列並用箭頭指定次序。

sentences.english: Creates a new input stream with the specified decompressor and buffer size.
sentences.chinese: 用指定的解壓器和緩衝區大小創建一個新的輸入流。

sentences.english: Cannot specify tables to truncate for this template.
sentences.chinese: 不能爲該模板指定要截斷的表。

sentences.english: Circular or rectangular duct can be specified.
sentences.chinese: 可指定是圓形管或矩形管。

sentences.english: In both functions, you obtain a reference to the application that you specify.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個函數都可獲得對指定應用程序的引用。

sentences.english: Would you be kind enough to chenge to another seat?
sentences.chinese: 請您暫時回到指定的位置上好嗎？
